data.title: Demi Moore and Ashton Kutcher Just Got Married!
data.meta_description: Demi Moore and Ashton Kutcher weds
data.text:
Yeah, with Hollywood marriages, they are usually so short. Ashton is 27 and Demi is in her early 40s.....I wonder how long that will last??

*playing the violin* They wont last long. I am suprised they dated a long time and now they got married? They wont last long.

not to mention Jennifer Garner and Ben Affleck dating for only 6 months and are already enaged.

*shooks head*

celebrities always take their marriages WAY too fast than regualr people do.

I loveeeeeeeeeee Demi Moore and Ashton Kutcher (MMMmmmm.. He is sure a great looking guy) I'm glad to see them married, They're a perfect match in heaven, and also make an awesome couples.

All what I say is: Wish them best of good luck.

As long as they are happy that's fine.

Cheri said:

I loveeeeeeeeeee Demi Moore and Ashton Kutcher (MMMmmmm.. He is sure a great looking guy) I'm glad to see them married, They're a perfect match in heaven, and also make an awesome couples.

Oh, excuse me a moment.

Just kidding, Cheri. I dislike Ashton Kutcher and just cannot stand him. I don't really have a good reason, except for "Punk'd."

I do think this will be just another short Hollywood marriage, though.

Steel said:

not to mention Jennifer Garner and Ben Affleck dating for only 6 months and are already enaged.

*shooks head*

celebrities always take their marriages WAY too fast than regualr people do.

Aren't they married now??

Steel said:

ugh...so much for him marrying older women.

Well, who wouldn't want to marry Demi Moore? Even in her current age, she's a hot and intelligent babe.

CONGRATULATIONS BOTH OF THEM, WISH THEM NOTHING BUT THE BEST

(i m impressed with demi moore she is 42 and her looking younger than that, also Ashton is 27 same mine he looks not younger for demi moore )

Im happy for them and do wish them lifetime of happy marriage bliss. I also love watching them as actors. It doesn't bother me how many years difference they are. Usually the man is older, but more and more younger men marry older women. Well...I'm one of them. My husband is more than 4 years younger than me. smile

Awesome! Another May/December marriage. To their credit, they stuck it out long as bf/gf. Personally I thought I would throw up if I had to hear one more news of marriage between a way older man and a younger chick, so this is a nice change of pace.

Magatsu said:

Well, who wouldn't want to marry Demi Moore? Even in her current age, she's a hot and intelligent babe.

Okay, she IS good looking but I wouldn't want to marry her. Allright, you knew you left yourself open for that one.

VamPyroX said:

Oh dear, not again.

I won't be surprised if Demi gets pregnant again and poses nude for Vanity Fair again.

cut that picture from the front of magazine and put it in nice wooden frame. Hang it up at your bedroom.

Nancy said:

They apparently are very happier couples. Some men like to go out with older women due to more mature and honest.

American Chopper and I are 7 years apart. We have been together for 7 years as we do love each other very much.
